metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6606 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read vulnerability was found in smbCalcSize infs/smb/client/netmisc.c in the Linux Kernel. This issue could allow a localattacker to crash the system or leak internal kernel information.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty/esm is affected and may need fixing.
